attributes.action: `MOTORCYCLISTS` WHO ARE A LAW ONTO THEMSELVES ON THE HIGHWAY NEED, TOUGH POLICE ACTION.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE A `STOP` PUT ON `MOTORCYCLISTS` WHO TAKE NO NOTICE OF ROAD MARKINGS, SPEED SIGNS, RIDE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ROAD, CUT IN AND OUT OF MOVING TRAFFIC, SPEED, THIS NEED`S `TOUGH POLICE ACTION` AS THEY HAVE GOT OUT OF CONTROL EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE THE MOST KILLED EACH YEAR, WHICH DOES NOT SUPPRISE ME AND OTHERS ON WHAT WE SEE EVERYDAY, THE MOTORIST HAS HAD THE BLAME TO SOME RESPECT WHICH IS WRONG, IF THEY ABIDE BY THE `HIGHWAY` CODE WHICH MOST DO NOT THEY WOULD SAVE THERE OWN LIVES, SEEMS ONE LAW FOR THEM AND ANOTHER FOR THE POOR CAR/LORRY DRIVER, THE POLICE SHOULD BE TAKING ACTION AGAINST THEM BUT FAIL ON IT.

LETS GET THE SAME RULES FOR ALL AND BRING DOWN THE DEATH/INJURY RATE, COMMON SENSE.
